p: Road traffic accident (RTA) was the most common cause of trauma in both dogs and cats. In dogs, mean age was 3.5â€‰years, the most commonly affected breeds were Chihuahua and Crossbreed with 55% being males, and 54% having neurological deficits. The frontal bone was the most affected, 55% had fractures in a single region with the cranial vault being overrepresented. Fractures were fragmented in 51.6%, displaced in 32.8% and depressed in 29.1%.
